name: BAT-app
description: BAO Access Tracking and Auditing App

scripts.coverage: babel-node node_modules/.bin/isparta cover --root ./src --report text --report html --report lcov node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha -- --reporter dot --require config/setup.js --recursive test
scripts.prebuild: rm -rf build && mkdir build && d2-manifest package.json manifest.webapp
scripts.prebuild_win: IF EXIST build rd build /S /Q && mkdir build
scripts.build: rm -rf build && webpack && npm run manifest
scripts.build_win: npm run prebuild_win && webpack && npm run manifest
scripts.postbuild: cp -rv index.html icon*.png i18n node_modules/jquery/dist/jquery.min.js node_modules/babel-polyfill/dist/polyfill.min.js manifest.webapp build/
scripts.postbuild_win_globalnpm: copyfiles -u -s index.html icon*.png node_modules/jquery/dist/jquery.min.js node_modules/babel-polyfill/dist/polyfill.min.js manifest.webapp build && npm run _postbuild_win_globalnpm
scripts.lint: eslint --fix src && ./node_modules/eslint/bin/eslint.js --env node,mocha --global expect,sinon,spy,stub --rule 'no-unused-expressions: 0' test && scss-lint
scripts.dist_win: npm run build_win && npm run postbuild_win_globalnpm
scripts.dist: npm run build && npm run postbuild && cd build && zip -r bat-app.zip * && cd ..

author: Gregory Wilson <gwilson@baosystems.com>
